section.name: The <hst-tmpl:module> tag
section.p: <hst-tmpl:module> instanties the current module and based on the attributes renders or executes the modules businesslogic.
Following table shows the attributes of the tag. An attribute's value is first found by the directly available value or by a default value.

tr.td: The optional variable name by which the result of the module is set attribute on the pageContext.
The class file that corresponds to this module. The class file will contain the 'render' and/or 'execute' method of this module.
The name of the module as defined in the hst:configuration underneath the hst:modules node.
Instructs the module class to perform render method.
Instructs the module class to perform execute method.
